unnormalised: My doc, Dr. Reddy, said avoiding butter chicken every day could cut my cancer risk by like, 0.5%! Worth it, maybe? ;) Gotta hit the gym more than just once a year too, I guess!
normalised: My doc, Doctor Reddy, said avoiding butter chicken every day could cut my cancer risk by like, zero point five percent! Worth it, maybe? Wink; Gotta hit the gym more than just once a year too, I guess!
